name: Monkeys and Puzzles
description:
This is Monkey and Puzzels.
This game was made for the LowRezGameJam.

Controls:
Arrow: Up, Down, Right, Left
X: Show health
X+C: Restart

Music by: Gruber
Some assets are from here: kicked in teeth
LowRezJam: https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2021

My Discord: https://discord.gg/q5w4gbT
